comments: Number of 15-subsequences of [ 1, n ] with just 3 contiguous pairs.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 8..1000
formula: G.f.: 55*(3+x)*x^8/(1-x)^13.a(n) = C(n+1, 9)*C(n+3, 3). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 13 2005, corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 16 2016
mathematica: Table[55 (n + 1) Binomial[n + 3, 11]/3, {n, 8, 31}] (* or *) Table[Binomial[n + 1, 9] Binomial[n + 3, 3], {n, 8, 31}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 16 2016 *)
author: thi ngoc dinh (via _R. K. Guy_)
